description: Master silky mashed potato with this easy recipe. Use yours as the ideal side dish, or top with crispy bacon, blue cheese or spring onion for a loaded version.
keywords: Mash,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Perfect Mashed Potato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Place salt in a 20 x 30cm roasting pan, shaking to evenly distribute salt. Pierce potatoes with a fork 5 times, then arrange over salt. Cover with foil and bake for 1 hour 15 minutes or until tender when pierced with a knife.

Remove pan from oven. Set aside for 10 minutes to cool slightly. When cool enough to handle, halve potatoes lengthways. Working with 1 potato half at a time, use a spoon to scoop out flesh into a fine sieve. Reserve skins (use to make Spicy potato skins). Discard salt. While flesh is still warm, push through sieve into a large bowl).
Add milk mixture to potato. Season well and stir with a wooden spoon until smooth and combined. Serve mashed potato topped with extra butter and thyme, and seasoned with pepper.
